languages.text: {n}Мужчина вскидывает голову и будто впервые вас видит. Но стоит ему открыть рот, как он вздрагивает всем телом и его глаза заволакивает пелена.{/n} "Имперская гвардия найдет моего сына. Найдет Тацита, я уверен..." {n}Офицер вздрагивает снова и прижимает руку к лицу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина вскидывает голову и будто впервые вас видит. Но стоит ему открыть рот, как он вздрагивает всем телом и его глаза заволакивает пелена.{/n} "Имперская гвардия найдет моего сына. Найдет Тацита, я уверен..." {n}Офицер вздрагивает снова и прижимает руку к лицу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}男は初めてこちらを見たかのようにハッと顔を上げた。しかし、口を開いた途端、全身が震えだし、目が曇った。{/n}「インペリアルガードが息子を探してくれます。必ずやタキタスを探してくれるでしょう…」{n}士官は再び震えて、手で顔を覆った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男は初めてこちらを見たかのようにハッと顔を上げた。しかし、口を開いた途端、全身が震えだし、目が曇った。{/n}「インペリアルガードが息子を探してくれます。必ずやタキタスを探してくれるでしょう…」{n}士官は再び震えて、手で顔を覆った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个男人猛地抬起头，显然是第一次注意到你。但当他张开嘴，准备回答问题的时候，他的整个身体突然开始颤抖起来，目光再次充满了迷雾。{/n}“帝国卫队一定会找到我的儿子。他们一定会找到塔西佗，我知道他们会的……”{n}这个人又颤抖了一下，一只手捂住了脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人猛地抬起头，显然是第一次注意到你。但当他张开嘴，准备回答问题的时候，他的整个身体突然开始颤抖起来，目光再次充满了迷雾。{/n}“帝国卫队一定会找到我的儿子。他们一定会找到塔西佗，我知道他们会的……”{n}这个人又颤抖了一下，一只手捂住了脸。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre levanta la cabeza como si te viera por primera vez. En cuanto abre la boca para responderte, su cuerpo se estremece y sus ojos se nublan.{/n} «La Guardia Imperial encontrará a mi hijo. Encontrarán a Tacitus, sé que lo harán...». {n}El oficial sigue temblando y se lleva una mano a la cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre levanta la cabeza como si te viera por primera vez. En cuanto abre la boca para responderte, su cuerpo se estremece y sus ojos se nublan.{/n} «La Guardia Imperial encontrará a mi hijo. Encontrarán a Tacitus, sé que lo harán...». {n}El oficial sigue temblando y se lleva una mano a la cara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme sursaute, relève la tête et semble enfin remarquer votre présence. Mais à l'instant même où il ouvre la bouche, son corps tout entier est pris de tremblements et son regard se brouille.{/n} « La Garde Impériale va trouver mon fils... Elle va trouver Tacitus, je le sais... » {n}L'officier tremble à nouveau et porte une main à son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme sursaute, relève la tête et semble enfin remarquer votre présence. Mais à l'instant même où il ouvre la bouche, son corps tout entier est pris de tremblements et son regard se brouille.{/n} « La Garde Impériale va trouver mon fils... Elle va trouver Tacitus, je le sais... » {n}L'officier tremble à nouveau et porte une main à son visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mann hebt seinen Kopf und nimmt dich anscheinend zum ersten Mal wirklich wahr. Doch als er den Mund öffnet, zuckt plötzlich sein gesamter Körper, und sein Blick wird wieder trüb.{/n} "Die imperiale Armee wird meinen Sohn finden. Sie wird Tacitus finden, ganz sicher ..." {n}Der Offizier zuckt erneut zusammen und presst eine Hand gegen sein Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

Doch als er den Mund öffnet, zuckt plötzlich sein gesamter Körper, und sein Blick wird wieder trüb.{/n} "Die imperiale Armee wird meinen Sohn finden. Sie wird Tacitus finden, ganz sicher ..." {n}Der Offizier zuckt erneut zusammen und presst eine Hand gegen sein Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adam başını silkiyor. Anlaşılan o ki seni ilk kez görüyor. Yanıt vermek için ağzını açtığında tüm bedeni titremeye başlıyor ve gözleri bulutlanıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk muhafızları oğlumu bulacak. Tacitus'u bulacaklar. Bulacaklarına eminim." {n}Subay yeniden irkilip bir elini yüzüne bastırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth, his whole body begins to shudder and his eyes cloud over.{/n} "The Imperial Guard will find my son. They'll find Tacitus, I know they will..." {n}The officer shudders again and presses a hand to his face.{/n}

Bulacaklarına eminim." {n}Subay yeniden irkilip bir elini yüzüne bastırıyor.{/n}
